title: Fans, Merch, Devices (feat. Colum Tyrrell, Tim Butterly & Mike Rainey)
description:
Colum Tyrrell and Tim Butterfly & Mike Rainey of The Dad Meat Podcast join The Bonfire and Dan and Jay introduce them to the one and only Summer Reign.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
